thread.title: M.D.C. Holdings Reports Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.43

author: Reuters Editorial
title: M.D.C. Holdings Reports Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.43
text:
15 AM / in 8 minutes BRIEF-M.D.C. Holdings Reports Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.43 Reuters Staff 
Feb 1 (Reuters) - Mdc Holdings Inc: 
* M.D.C. HOLDINGS ANNOUNCES 2017 FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR RESULTS * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.43 
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.66 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S 
* QTRLY HOME SALE REVENUES OF $702.6 MILLION VERSUS $715.8 MILLION‍​ 
* QTRLY ‍DOLLAR VALUE OF NET NEW ORDERS OF $574.3 MILLION, UP 23% FROM $465.9 MILLION​ 
* QTRLY ‍TOTAL HOME AND LAND SALE REVENUES $704.3 MILLION VERSUS $716.6 MILLION​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
